description: Charlton leave it late to overcome a 10-man Peterborough with a 2-1 win.
title: Charlton Athletic 2-1 Peterborough United
title_page: Charlton Athletic 2-1 Peterborough United - BBC Sport
maintext:
Charlton Athletic have failed to win any of their last 13 league games against Peterborough United (D5 L8), with the Addicks only once enduring a longer winless league run outside the top tier against a single opponent â€“ a 14-match spell against Millwall between 1922 and 1930.
Peterborough United are unbeaten across their last six away league games against Charlton Athletic (W4 D2) since a 2-0 defeat at The Valley in November 2012.
Charlton have won each of their last three midweek (Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday) league games, their longest such winning run since winning four in a row from March to April 2021.
